item.title: jeFF0Falltrades Sandbox Crackme
item.description: Introduction A few days ago, I noticed that one of my favorite reverse engineer youtubers, jeFF0Falltrades had uploaded a 2-part series on setting up a DIY Malware Analysis Sandbox. I already had a Malware Analysis lab setup (FLARE VM), but I had not used in quite a while. Moreover, one of the most important parts, faking & capturing internet traffic using Fakenet-ng was not really working for me. Therefore, I decided to revamp my lab using his video series.
